devede-3.16.9-2 can convert AVI to DVD.
am googling devede-3.16.9-2
Devede does not do the job?
I am just trying to install devede to make the avi file into a dvd. will it also copy a dvd to the hard drive?
can I put more than one avi file on the dvd?
dvdbackup can back up the dvd to the hard drive. If you wish to convert it to something smaller, check out handbrake or ogmrip. That's just for starters.

when I tried to download devede from the webpage I got a message that there is n older version in a repository and that would be better supported. Should I install the deb from the webpage or go look for the older version.
I go look for dvd backup

I don't regularly use devede but I remember putting many avi as i can on one single dvd for my brother or such. So I know it can deal with many avis. As for older or newer version, it's your call. What works for me in the past can work for you presently. Check ppa or getdeb if you want newer version,.
dvdbackup is commandline. I know brasero can do the job of 1-on-1 copy.
I have copied all of your good advice into a notes file and will continue to follow it up tomorrow. Thank you so much.
No problem. With dvdbackup, you're able to write a script that automagically do stuffs + notify ; convert if necessary. ;)
10-15 minutes.
